snippet: Mortgages guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs surged by 50 percent as tighter credit standards made these programs all the more attractive to members of the military.
abstract: Lisa Prevost Mortgages column notes that mortgages guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs have surged by 50 percent as tighter credit standards made the program more attractive to members of the military.
lead_paragraph: Mortgages guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs surged by 50 percent as tighter credit standards made these programs all the more attractive to members of the military.

headline.print_headline: V.A. Loans Surge in Fiscal Year
headline.seo: Mortgages — V.A. Loans Surge in Fiscal Year
headline.main: V.A. Loans Surge in Fiscal Year
